text: Human Hearts is an album by the indie pop band Maritime. It is the band's fourth full-length album and was released on April 5, 2011. == Track listing == # "It's Casual" # "Paraphernalia" # "Black Bones" # "Peopling of London" # "Air Arizona" # "Faint of Hearts" # "Annihilation Eyes" # "Out Numbering" # "C’mon Sense" # "Apple of My Irony" ==References== Category:2011 albums Category:Maritime (band) albums Category:Dangerbird Records albums
title: Human Hearts
